definition: to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: When I am 40, I want to be elegant and beautiful like Maggie Cheung.
sentences.chinese: 當我四十歲的時候，希望能像張曼玉一樣優雅美麗。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that Maggie Cheung at this time made a wide advertsiement for Beijing's public transportation.
sentences.chinese: 這次張曼玉無疑給北京的公共交通作了一次大廣告。

definition: Chow Yun-Fat (1955-), Hong Kong TV and film star
Gong Li (1965-), PRC female film star
third category movie (containing sexual or violent content)
to win instant success (idiom)/to become an instant hit
Ekin Cheng (1967-), Hong Kong actor and pop singer
Andy Lau (1961-), Hong Kong Cantopop singer and actor

golden branch, jade leaves (idiom); fig. blue-blooded nobility, esp. imperial kinsmen or peerless beauty
